short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds and alerts you about duplicate tabs in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Duplicate Tab Finder helps you streamline your browsing experience by identifying and managing duplicate tabs in your browser. With its intuitive interface, you can view, group, or automatically close duplicate tabs, reducing clutter and boosting productivity. Works seamlessly with Chrome and Firefox browsers. Lightweight and easy to use, it's a must-have tool for multitaskers and tab hoarders!
